title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 332.2 - Ordinary disability retirement eligibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 332.2 - Ordinary disability retirement eligibility

State Regulations

Members of the Division of State Police with sufficient
service credit to satisfy the requirements of section
362
of the Retirement and Social Security

Law may file for ordinary disability retirement pursuant to that section until
they have accumulated five years of total service credit in the Division of

State Police. Such members must actually be in service at the time the
application is filed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
332.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
